chunk:
nourishtea Nourish Organic Rejuvenating Argan Butter

Brand: nourishtea

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Zea Mays (Corn) Starch*, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil*, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Nut Oil*, Fragrance*, Tocopherol (Vitamin E).*Certified Organic
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
